channel.title: Silvarea 530 Loading 614/718
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XHWSw26.png[/img]
[u][i][b]Credits/Contributors [/b][/i][/u] Sir Tom - Ieldor 530 Graham - OpenRS Sean - Worldlist Documentation Luke132 - XenoRune 530 DragonKK - Cache Tools - Used as referances Flamable - 530 Client HD/LD Nando - 530 Loading 592 Client Referance maffia-rpg- Thread Layout/Listing
[b][u]Developers[/u][/b] Belthazar Myself Slayu(Marcus) Im Frizzy(Kyle)
Silvarea is a RuneScape Emulator written in Java, We intend to keep the core of the server light-weight base on the netty 4-final library with Groovy scripting based content. (Every Skills, Mini-games, Quests) will be done in groovy. I am looking for more developers once the core is completed to our satisfaction. We plan to make the server as user-friendly as possible. We have a lot of plans with this framework/revision. Once we get the basics of the framework completed. We will decide on what data we will want to load, We want to load up to 718 data, but currently 614 data.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TTtoV2T.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Yp21Mkx.png[/img] [iMG]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/401/jiff.png[/img] [IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/3756/ok55.png[/img] [IMG]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/3272/79om.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bkkXPJD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0f0i3FE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K55W4xk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1Y479Ac.png[/img]
[/center]

Silvarea is a RuneScape Emulator written in Java,
We intend to keep the core of the server light-weight base on the netty 4-final library with Groovy scripting based content.
(Every Skills, Mini-games, Quests) will be done in groovy.
I am looking for more developers once the core is completed to our satisfaction.
We plan to make the server as user-friendly as possible. We have a lot of plans with this framework/revision.
Once we get the basics of the framework completed. We will decide on what data we will want to load,
